mapper.insert: insert into orders (oid,frid, products_total, delivery_charge, order_total, planned_delivery_date, actual_delivery_date, order_date, ordered_by, delivery_address, order_detail,status, note) values (#{oid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{frid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productsTotal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deliveryCharge,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{orderTotal,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{plannedDeliveryDate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{actualDeliveryDate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderDate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliveryAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderDetail,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update orders set products_total = #{productsTotal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, frid = #{frid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delivery_charge = #{deliveryCharge,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, order_total = #{orderTotal,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, planned_delivery_date = #{plannedDeliveryDate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, actual_delivery_date = #{actualDeliveryDate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_date = #{orderDate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ordered_by = #{orderedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delivery_address = #{deliveryAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_detail = #{orderDetail,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, note = #{note,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where oid = #{oid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select oid, frid,products_total, delivery_charge, order_total, planned_delivery_date, actual_delivery_date, order_date, ordered_by, delivery_address, order_detail,status, note from orders where oid = #{oid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select oid, frid,products_total, delivery_charge, order_total, planned_delivery_date, actual_delivery_date, order_date, ordered_by, delivery_address, order_detail,status, note from orders
